channel.title: Octavi-OS on lesfoxbiao
channel.description: Recent content in Octavi-OS on lesfoxbiao

item.title: Octavi OS for Xiaomi Mi 6
item.description: OctaviOS is an AOSP based rom focusing on Unique and Smooth UI with handy features. OctaviOS is a reborn of pie based PearlOS. Your warranty is now void. We are not responsible for anything that may happen to your phone by installing any custom ROMs and/or kernels. You do it at your own risk and take the responsibility upon yourself and you are not to blame us or XDA and its respected developers.
